the petal * treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts bptr bpdc around the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts chain 2 miss the first 2 petals made below treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the last 2 petals* repeat from * to * 4 more times treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts turn 7 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st *chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts fptr fpdc around the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts do not turn your work yet this is where we will make our first leaf chain 3 in the top of the last treble_crochet double_crochet make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s see picture 1 chain 2 make 3 more treble_crochet s double_crochet s in the same st then sl-st around the treble_crochet double_crochet on the row below turn 8 sl-st into the 1st 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s now sl-st into the chain 2 space now lets make a picot chain 3 sl-st into the 3rd chain from the hook sl-st back into the chain space again now sl- st into the last 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s make a treble_crochet double_crochet into the st where you started your leaf treble_crochet in the next st chain 2 miss the chain 2 space make a bobble st in the next st chain 2 miss the chain 2 space * treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts bptr bpdc around the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts chain 2 miss the chain 2 space make a bobble st chain 2 miss the chain 2 space* repeat from * to * 4 more times treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts now we are going to make another leaf do not turn your work yet chain 3 in the top of the last treble_crochet double_crochet make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 2 make 3 more treble_crochet s double_crochet s in the same st then sl-st around
